description:
Shasuryu Shasha is the elder brother and Chieftain of the Green Claw tribe. He is among the few lizardmen to fight against http://anidb.net/ch92893 [Cocytus] and be revived. He and http://anidb.net/ch92892 [his brother] are very caring of each other.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shasuryu Shasha
